mapper.delete: delete from po_headers where po_header_id in (${ids})
update po_headers set status=#{status} where po_header_id in (${ids})
mapper.select: SELECT ph.*, fu_agent.USER_NAME as agent_name, fu_create.USER_NAME as create_name, fu_update.USER_NAME as update_name , mc.customer_name as vendor_name FROM po_headers ph LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu_agent on ph.agent_id = fu_agent._id -- 采购人 LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu_create on ph.create_by = fu_create._id -- 创建人 LEFT JOIN fnd_user fu_update on ph.update_by = fu_update._id -- 更新人 LEFT JOIN mdm_customers mc on ph.vendor_id = mc.customer_id -- 供应商 where po_header_id=#{po_header_id}
